post_text: September 10, 2014 at 6:27â€¯PM#1What about making a snapshot macro to store cue on selected cuelist, for example on sequence 1"IfoutputOn attribute 1 thruFixture 1 thru - group 998channel 1 thru - group 998On attribute 1Store sequence 1 cueGoLabel cueclearclearclear"BUT, MA label not that new cue which has been saved, but previous (for eg. you have 5 cue on cuelist>use snapshot to store cue 6>ma label cue 5 not 6). title: macro: store cue and label
